summary: Bubba Mabry, a gullible private detective, becomes the prime suspect in a tabloid reporter's murder after being hired to snoop on him by a mysterious celebrity.
cast: Jay Mohr|Robert Patrick|Joe Mantegna|Mike Starr|Lindsay Price|Nikki Cox|Paul Rodriguez|John F. O'Donohue|Katt Williams|Ellen Albertini Dow|Ken Davitian|Ernie Hudson|Kevin Chapman|Perry Anzilotti|Heather Wahlquist|Gerry Bednob|Gregory Cruz|David Mattey|Joyce Feurring|Greg Running|Jodi Katz|Barry Habib|Erika Bruun-Andersen|Marnie Alexenburg|Faleolo Alailima|Lacey Eberl|Jess Harnell|Johnny Bell|James Caulfield|David Steinberg|Ray Morales|Teresa Berkin|James Blackburn|Daniel Patrick Ellis|Michael Wayne Foster|Ken Hurst|Sheik Kargbo|Paulah May|Lalo Reyes|John Robert|Tony Ruiz
title: Lonely Street
